title: Episode 220:  ‘The First Taboo’ (Wonder Dave)
itunes:title: ‘The First Taboo’ (Wonder Dave)
description:
Wanna know the secret to great - and sex-positive - parenting? Comedian, writer, and performer Wonder Dave tells us how his parents got it right by slipping him quality learning materials early on, and how he shared his newfound knowledge with his best friend Nate. 2 teenage boys on a sleepover, what could go wrong? Well for starters, they could establish good ground rules like no slut-shaming, discover how to clearly communicate their needs and feelings, and determine the importance of a high thread count. Hey, does that feel a little ‘toothy’ to you? #Discovery #Masturbation #BoysAndSex

 

Song: ‘Passionate’ (Backstreet Boys)

About the storyteller:

 

Wonder Dave is a comedian, writer, performer and swell human being. He is the co-creator of the Mental Health Comedy Hour, a show where comedians tell jokes and talk about mental health. Dave is a pro wrestling commentator for Hoodslam and co-host of the Oakland variety show The Ruckus and Rumpus Revival. 

 

Find him online at WonderDave.org  

And for all the social media links in one place, visit https://linktr.ee/wonderdave

 

Episode links:

 

Beducated: 

Y’all, we’ve got a new sponsor: Beducated! They’re like the Netflix of Sexual Wellness; they are an online course platform with easy-to-follow video, audio, and written guides. They provide techniques & information to level-up your love life, because Beducated believes that sexual happiness is trainable.
They offer an expert-backed library of courses from Tantra to Kink to more. You can explore new practices and upgrade your lovemaking skills. 

Beducated’s Subscription Benefits include

  • Unlimited access to all their online courses 
  • +100 hours of video & audio content 
  • Tips from world-renowned educators 
  • New content every week 
  • High-quality streaming on all devices

You can try Beducated for 1 day for FREE and get 65% off Beducated’s yearly pass with my code DIXIE. 

Just go to http://beducate.me/dixie - and Your 65% off will be locked in for life! 

 

Uberlube: Uberlube is a luxurious, high-grade silicone lubricant made from clean, body-friendly ingredients; it’s just silicone with a little Vitamin E. Uberlube is Dixie’s favorite lube, and they’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer – 10% off and free shipping when you use my code “Dixie” at UberLube.com. That’s 10% off and free shipping!

 

LIVE SHOW: Bawdy’s ‘Fingers Crossed’ is now on Friday, April 22, 2022. You can attend live in San Francisco or buy a Livestream ticket and watch from home, and this Bawdy features true stories from Elizabeth Barlow, Dolan Wolf, Mosa Maxwell-Smith, Brendan Taylor, and brand new musical act Katie Cookie. Get tickets at https://bit.ly/BawdyFingersCrossedA

 

Love Personal Storytelling?

I want to help you improve your own stories!

There are several ways for us to work together:

 

WORKSHOP: Wanna sign up for the next ‘How to Be Fascinating: Dixie’s Secret System for Brilliant Storytelling’? The first few workshops got rave reviews from the attendees - and I’ve added weekly office hours for custom coaching and Q&A, and a final storytelling performance for YOU and your friends. It just keeps getting better, and this class is a prerequisite for my upcoming Sex and Story workshop, and Advanced Storytelling workshop that’s on the way later this year. Make sure you’re one of the first to know about the next ‘How to be Fascinating’; go to 

www.BawdyStorytelling.com/subscribe 

Or email me at Dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com

 

ONE-ON-ONE COACHING: I’m offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery to help you find, create and polish your favorite stories. Do you just wanna learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you communicate with clarity. Are you writing a memoir, creating a podcast, working on brand storytelling for your business or some other story-related endeavor? Email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com and let’s chat!

 

Patreon: Want a free Livestream ticket to our next show? Become a member on Patreon (at the $10/month level or higher) by April 18th and tell me you wanna watch the Livestream on April 22nd,  and I’ll send you a free ticket - but hurry, cause you need to join by April 18th. 

 Bawdy is a global movement, and you can make 2022 the year that you make your own wildly adventurous dreams come true. Patreon is how Bawdy is still here after 2 years away from our beloved live shows and community; we’ve changed so many lives and we want to help you experience pleasure and freedom at whatever level you desire. Start living a fully expressed life, wherever you are. Patreon is how Bawdy is still here after time away from our beloved live shows and community, but it’s because of people like you.

Become a member of our Patreon community now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy 

(and Thank You!)

 

You can also support Bawdy by sending your one-time donation to:

Venmo: https://venmo.com/u/bawdystorytelling
Paypal: https://paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Buy Me a Coffee: http://buymeacoff.ee/bawdy

CashApp: Cash.app/$DixieDeLaTour

THANK YOU for your generosity - and for loving Bawdy!

 

ProTip: Subscribe to the Bawdy Storytelling email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming storytelling workshops, livestreams, podcasts, live shows and Special Events first at

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

Cameo/Custom Dixie video: Need some Applause Tiddies?  I’ve been having so much fun making customized videos, and they make such a great Valentine’s Day gift! Send your friends and lovers a custom ‘Cameo’ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies), it’s a great way to send love from far away to a Bawdy fan… For just $69, you and I can have a short zoom call, you can tell me all about the recipient, and I’ll make a custom video from you for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible!

Team Bawdy is:

 

Podcast Producer: Roman Den houdijker
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!

Want more Bawdy?
www.BawdyStorytelling.com
Follow us on Twitter: @Bawdy
On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bawdystorytelling/
Like us at www.Facebook.com/BawdyStorytelling
Join us on FetLife: https://fetlife.com/groups/46341
Support us on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy
Watch us on YouTube at http://bit.ly/BawdyTV
